channel.title: Read THIS or you may be sorry!
channel.description:
[u]A month ago i got this pm: [/u] ohilol CBA to Post
Rep: 10 [Rep++] Offline
Posts: 0
Silab's Client - Like real RS « Sent to: Jonross, Timister, t3h k1ller, MoparGeek, lawton2k7, hydra dragon, bloop, ZZZpk, kiev, Ninnja on: May 09, 2007, 09:08:43 AM » Reply to All Quote Reply Remove
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- You know that client Silab's been working on? That's just like real rs? Well here it is.
I hate her, and I want revenge on her for ripping me off with the headicon code.
Here it is, all it needs is the newest cache for priv servers (included):
Client: [Link Removed]
Cache:[Link Removed]
Please send it around a bit, let everyone start using it so she gets angry. Scan both files if you want, it's legit.
[b]I will warn everyone not to download pm's like this !!! It may be virus on and it can make consequence for you!!!![/b]
